993290.name: JOBU-KI
993290.description:
Welcome to PAPITO!
A colorful world populated with weird and fun creatures.
Fly as far as you can, collect all the coins and take advantage of some boosters.
Simple joyful endless runner with some eastern eggs around.

- Endless runner game

- Flight controls system

- Keyboard control + Mouse click for throttle and brake

- Chill mood in colorful environments

- Procedural terrain generation

- Collect all distance medals, up to 1000!

- Challengue yourself collecting coins and flying as fas as you can

- Game speed will increase over time!

- Premium reskin included!
